about_the_game:
From a random guy in his parents apartment, comes a local multiplayer twin-stick shooter with a twist, rather than dying by taking too much damage, you die upon getting knocked off screen. This is definitely an original mechanic, yup I'm sure there's absolutely no game with this mechanic /s

Utilize two out of over a dozen abilities to find a synergy that fits your play style. One for defense and utility and the second one to finish off high damaged opponents.

Along with the ability to change the type of weapon in use, swapping between different fire rates and damage to complement your way to battle

Play with friends and see who can come out on top or play it alone in high score based challenges

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 384 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any DX10, DX11, DX12 capable GPUs
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

short_description: A top down twin stick shooter game with a somewhat unhealthy obsession with knockback with a create-a-class system
